overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across multiple social media platforms, with a combined following of 3,580. Engagement varies across platforms, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction rates, particularly in professional and research-related topics.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research findings, grants, and advancements in computational methods.
Posts related to job openings, particularly in academia and research.
Announcements and updates about upcoming presentations and conferences.

recommendations: Increase posting frequency on LinkedIn to capitalize on higher engagement rates.
Incorporate more interactive content such as polls or Q&A sessions to boost engagement on Bluesky and Mastodon.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement on Mastodon is moderate, with a focus on discussions of research updates and methodologies.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn posts receive the highest engagement, especially when announcing new research achievements and opportunities.
platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky shows potential for higher engagement with posts related to new publications and conference presentations.
